author: pipermerriam
content: Up until now, most of our clients are being run from data centers. NAT traversal both via upnp and in-protocol hole punching are both priority items for this year as we transition into on-boarding users. I would encourage opening an issue in the relevant client repository... and for clients.. I would encourage you to document whether your client has upnp support.

author: rafa3ls
content: Shisui have upnp and it sould be the best and quickest solution, unlucky in my network the router2, that gives me access to the internet, do not support or is misconfigured upnp (I can not fix it). I'll try VPN as workaround, it is suitable for my case.
